## City tour of Regensburg

There will be a free guided tour of Regensburg historical town centre before the workshop (on **Tuesday 25th February** from 17.30 - 19.00). Participation on the tour is subject to signing up in advance.


<br>

## Workshop dinner

There will be a workshop dinner on **Wednesday 26th February** at 19.00. Payment is the responsibility of the participant.
